newsitem.title: JAPAN: Fujisawa to transfer Astra sales rights in Japan.
newsitem.headline: Fujisawa to transfer Astra sales rights in Japan.

text.p: Fujisawa Pharmaceutical Co Ltd said on Monday that it had agreed with AB Astra of Sweden to transfer the right to sell Astra products to Astra Japan Ltd in April 1998.
Fujisawa Pharmaceutical sold 23.9 billion yen worth of Astra products in the 1995/96 business year, the company said in a statement.
Astra Japan, in which the Swedish drug maker owns 90 percent and Fujisawa 10 percent, is currently constructing its own packaging factory and distribution centre in Japan, the statement said.
